results.title: Differential expression of organic cation transporter OCT-3 in oral premalignant and malignant lesions: potential implications in the antineoplastic effects of metformin.
results.text_hl: Moreover, in @<m>DISEASE_Dyskinesias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020820 @@@oral dysplasias@@@, high @GENE_SLC22A3 @GENE_6581 @@@OCT-3@@@ expression localized to epithelial compartments where mTORC1 signaling was also upregulated suggestive of a potential local effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Metformin Inhibits the Development of L-DOPA-Induced Dyskinesia in a Murine Model of Parkinson's Disease.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ showed a long-lasting effect on axial, limb, and @<m>DISEASE_Dyskinesias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020820 @@@orofacial abnormal involuntary movement@@@ scores for up to 20 days after treatment initiation.
